flawed_nl_solution:
The number of customers who were served coffee in the restaurant is 3/5*25 = <<3/5*25=51>>51
If the total number of customers who came to the restaurant was 25, then 25-51 = <<25-51=-26>>-26 customers did not buy coffee

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
